attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: send immigrants back to thier own country and stop using the british peoples tax money to pay for them & thier familys who dont even live in this country. britian is falling apart in front of our very eyes.also human right should be scrapped.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
